Jennifer Bleam, Sales Sherpa
Jennifer Bleam, Sales Sherpa
posts.content:
Unpopular Opinion: 

If you know the objections you’ll hear in a sales call, you should diffuse those objections BEFORE you meet.

Proactive > Reactive
posts.commentAdded: Great point! Addressing objections upfront can truly set the tone for a more productive conversation. Proactive strategies make all the difference!

posts.name:
Damesha Craig, Leadership Coach and Startup Advisor
Damesha Craig, Leadership Coach and Startup Advisor
posts.content:
Sunday SoulDay is back for our Season 3 opener in Australia 🇦🇺!! 

We welcome, a seasoned entrepreneur, business coach, and the creator of Flowjo, a coaching program designed to help ADHD founders overcome burnout, harness their unique superpowers, and achieve their goals with ease. Diagnosed with ADHD as a child, Jamie has experienced burnout three times—once as a professional tennis player and twice as a business owner. These challenges led him to deeply research the connection between ADHD, burnout, and flow, turning his insights into tools that empower others.

Jamie is also the author of Pressure Gauge Mindset and the founder of two successful companies—Dealflow and Exitplanr—which have guided over 400 entrepreneurs through successful business exits!! Through his coaching practice, Jamie Toyne Coaching & Consulting, and his innovative Flowjo Finder Diagnostic Tool, Jamie is on a mission to help business owners reclaim balance, unlock their full potential, and start flowing toward sustainable success.

Join us this Sunday in our new time slot 12noon MST as we explore Jamie’s professional tennis journey, his transformative path from pain to purpose, and the strategies he employs to maintain flow and avoid burnout.

Be sure to give us a follow on our LinkedIn page for more updates.
.
.
posts.commentAdded: Excited for the Season 3 opener! Jamie’s journey is truly inspiring—can’t wait to learn from his insights on flow and burnout. 🌟 #SundaySoulDay

posts.name:
Tomasz Boinski
Tomasz Boinski
posts.content:
𝐄𝐱𝐩𝐥𝐨𝐫𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐍𝐞𝐰 𝐇𝐨𝐫𝐢𝐳𝐨𝐧𝐬: 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐁𝐥𝐮𝐞 𝐎𝐜𝐞𝐚𝐧 𝐒𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐠𝐲 
At TechEdge Dynamics, we believe in driving innovation and creating new opportunities rather than just competing in the same crowded spaces. That’s why we’re inspired by the principles of the Blue Ocean Strategy, a concept introduced by Kim and Mauborgne in their groundbreaking book.

The metaphor of red and blue oceans provides a powerful way to rethink market opportunities. Red oceans represent the industries we know today, the established markets where competition is fierce, boundaries are clear, and everyone fights over the same slice of the pie. While success is possible, the constant competition often limits growth and profitability.

Blue oceans, on the other hand, are the industries and markets that don’t yet exist, the untouched spaces of potential where competition is irrelevant because the rules of the game haven’t been written yet. In blue oceans, companies focus on creating demand rather than competing for it. This approach offers a unique chance for rapid, sustainable, and profitable growth.

By embracing blue ocean strategies, businesses can shift their focus from competing to creating. This mindset encourages innovation, bold thinking, and playing a different game entirely; reshaping the market environment instead of merely reacting to it.

At, we strive to harness this strategy by thinking beyond traditional boundaries and unlocking new opportunities for growth. It’s about looking at the unknown not as a risk but as a space for endless possibility.

 What’s your perspective on creating rather than competing? Let us know in the comments. Let’s shape the future together.
posts.commentAdded: Absolutely agree! Embracing the Blue Ocean Strategy opens doors to innovation and growth. Excited to see where this mindset takes us! 🌊✨

posts.name:
Walter Crosby
Walter Crosby
posts.content:
Stop for a moment and think about the last time you gave a warning that you never followed through on. 

Every empty threat chips away at your leadership credibility. Your team isn't just hearing your words - they're watching your actions.
Remember: Silence is better than promises you won't keep.

 Share your best tip for following through on consequences.

comments.commentText: Silence really is better than broken promises; great point!

posts.commentAdded: Great reminder! Following through builds trust. I suggest setting clear expectations and regularly checking in on progress. What do you think?

posts.name:
Sam Hilsman
Sam Hilsman
posts.content:
I love tools. I'm a tool fiend. I can't even lie. I'm obsessed with trying new little tools. Today I made HiiBo eat a cookie. 

is neat. It appears to be sitting on top of a few different LLMs, allowing you to change models and modifying your output. These video gen tools are getting better and better. Character recognition & rendering is still just OK. But your control over the output should continue to improve over time, and sowill just keep getting better and better as the LLMs underneath get better.

In technology, I've come to learn that layering is good. It indicates that a particular technology is gaining depth.

is designed as a user-centric (CONTEXT) layer on top of the LLM technology that we've all come to know and love.

We sit on top of all these beautiful LLMs, and retain your context across all your conversations. The first Personal AI.

Check us out. Product Ambassador program opens 2/14, Pre-sales begin 4/27 (my mom's birthday), and the Alpha launches 6/9/25.

comments.commentText: cute but this doesn't even look like me wtf

posts.commentAdded: Exciting times ahead in the AI space! Love how layering enhances user experience. Cant wait to see HiiBo evolve further!

posts.name:

Salesforce Data Cloud
posts.content:
Step into the Future of CRM with Agentforce and Data Cloud 

 Check out our latest demo to see how Agentforce, powered by Data Cloud, turns unstructured data into automation and business value using RAG. A few highlights:

Hybrid search: Not just any search—find exactly what Agentforce needs with cutting-edge search that understands the context of queries along with keywords

Data Retrievers: Pull and enrich any LLM of your choice with valuable insights from PDFs and technical docs, without compromising trust

Enriched AI Prompts: Boost your Agentforce with prompts that aren't only make it smart but contextually aware

Transform unstructured data into a goldmine of opportunities with Agentforce. It's not just about managing data; it's about mastering it to drive growth and innovation. Ready to make your data work smarter?  Dive into our demo now:

comments.commentText: Great demo! Agentforce, powered by Data Cloud, is definitely the future of CRM. The hybrid search and data retrievers are impressive features that will save a lot of time and effort for businesses. Enriched AI prompts will also make Agentforce smarter and more contextually aware. This is a game-changer for managing and mastering unstructured data. I can't wait to see how this will drive growth and innovation for businesses. Well done!

Wow, Agentforce sounds like it has superpowers!  Turning unstructured data into business value? It's like turning chaos into gold! Can't wait to see how this magic unfolds. ‍️
